participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and enthusiastic, loves to engage with children and bring out their creativity.
participant_1.background: I am a kindergarten teacher. I studied early childhood education in college. I have a puppy named Tiki. My favorite food is spicy Tex-Mex.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and friendly, enjoys physical activities and values family time.
participant_2.background: I always sleep 8 hours a day. I work as an electrician. I love hamburgers. I hate winter. I go running a lot.

content.text: What do you like most about your job?
I like that I get to work with my hands, and I like that I'm able to help people.
That's awesome! I love that I get to work with kids, and I love that I'm able to help them learn and grow.
What's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I like to go running, and I like to spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I like to go hiking, and I like to spend time with my dog.
Oh, I love dogs! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a puppy named Tiki. She's a little bit crazy, but she's also very sweet.
Oh, she sounds adorable! I'd love to meet her sometime.
Sure! I'll bring her with me next time we hang out.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
